goal: 帮我在请休假系统里面请2025年11月28到2025年11月29这两天的年休假，请假事由是准备计划休息和恢复精力，拟前往地区是上海市梅赛德斯奔驰文化中心。

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 29: Tap on the "请休假" (Leave Request) icon to enter the leave application form (AppCompatImageView) at coordinates (129, 301)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Tap on the "请休假" (Leave Request) icon to enter the leave application form

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 12: Select "年休假" (Annual Leave) by tapping on its parent container (LinearLayout) at coordinates (205, 191)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Select "年休假" (Annual Leave) by tapping on its parent container

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 19: Tap on the end date field to modify it from 2025-11-28 to 2025-11-29 (LinearLayout) at coordinates (205, 275)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Tap on the end date field to modify it from 2025-11-28 to 2025-11-29

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 86: Select November 29, 2025 in the date picker (TextView) at coordinates (354, 660)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Select November 29, 2025 in the date picker

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 35: Confirm the selected dates to proceed to the next step (entering reason and destination) (MaterialButton) at coordinates (205, 850)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Confirm the selected dates to proceed to the next step (entering reason and destination)

params.text: 准备计划休息和恢复精力

action_sequence.description: Input text: '准备计划休息和恢复精力' at index 14

params.text: 上海市梅赛德斯奔驰文化中心

action_sequence.description: Input text: '上海市梅赛德斯奔驰文化中心' at index 20
Tap element at index 31: Submit the completed leave request (MaterialButton) at coordinates (304, 850)
Tap element at index 39: Confirm the submission in the dialog box (MaterialButton) at coordinates (323, 509)
action_sequence.specific_behavior: Confirm the submission in the dialog box

action_sequence.description: Tap element at index 39: Dismiss the success confirmation dialog (MaterialButton) at coordinates (323, 509)

children.text: 附件 (非必须, 最多一张图片)

metadata.output: Successfully submitted annual leave request for November 28-29, 2025, with the specified reason and destination.
